ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ply1domn.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_ply1crng | |- ( R e. CRing -> P e. CRing ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_ply1domn | |- ( R e. Domn -> P e. Domn ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ R e. Domn ) -> ( P e. CRing /\ P e. Domn ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_isidom | |- ( R e. IDomn <-> ( R e. CRing /\ R e. Domn ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_isidom | |- ( P e. IDomn <-> ( P e. CRing /\ P e. Domn ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_3imtr4i | |- ( R e. IDomn -> P e. IDomn ) |
